title: The permission shall not be required for the following types of repairs to existing authorised building, which do not amount to additions or alternations
clause_text: The permission shall not be required for the following types of repairs to existing authorised building, which do not amount to additions or alternations. Only intimation to the Authority by the owner alongwith the certificate of licensed personnel shall be given. Changing of doors and windows in the same position. Strengthening of existing walls, existing roof in the same position.
